name: TS Order Management - Dashboard Stats Webhook

parameters.content:
# üìä Dashboard Stats Webhook

## üìù **Sticky Note: Real-time Dashboard Metrics**

```yaml
PURPOSE: Provides live stats for main dashboard display
ENDPOINT: /webhook/dashboard-stats
METHOD: POST
TRIGGER: Dashboard page load & 30-second refresh

CONNECTS TO:
- Orders table (active orders, pickup ready)
- Productions table (items in production)
- Batches table (queue length)

REQUEST FORMAT:
{
  "facility": "CHICO" | "OUTPOST" | "ALL"
}

RETURNS:
{
  "success": true,
  "stats": {
    "activeOrders": 42,      # Orders not completed/cancelled/shipped
    "inProduction": 18,      # Items printing/QC/cutting
    "readyPickup": 12,       # Orders ready for customer pickup
    "queueItems": 24,        # Batches waiting or ready to print
    "lastUpdated": "ISO timestamp",
    "facility": "CHICO"
  }
}

FIELD MAPPINGS:
Active Orders:
- Order Status != 'Completed'
- Order Status != 'Cancelled' 
- Order Status != 'Shipped'
- Facility = {requested} (if not ALL)

In Production:
- Production Status = 'Printing' OR
- Production Status = 'QC' OR
- Production Status = 'Cutting'
- Facility filter applied

Ready for Pickup:
- Order Status = 'Ready for Pickup'
- Fulfillment Option = 'Pickup'
- Facility filter applied

Queue Items:
- Batch Status = 'Waiting' OR
- Batch Status = 'Ready to Print'
- Facility filter applied

PERFORMANCE NOTES:
- 4 parallel Airtable queries
- Returns counts only (not full records)
- ~500ms typical response time
- CORS enabled for GitHub Pages

CRITICAL NOTES:
- Facility "ALL" returns combined stats
- Missing facility defaults to "ALL"
- Empty results return 0 counts
- Used by dashboard auto-refresh

TROUBLESHOOTING:
- Check Order Status values match exactly
- Verify Facility field exists in all tables
- Ensure Batch Status values are correct
- Monitor Airtable rate limits

DASHBOARD INTEGRATION:
// In your dashboard JavaScript:
async function loadStats() {
  const facility = localStorage.getItem('selectedFacility') || 'ALL';
  const response = await fetch(CONFIG.N8N_BASE + '/webhook/dashboard-stats', {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' },
    body: JSON.stringify({ facility })
  });
  const data = await response.json();
  
  // Update UI
  document.getElementById('orders-ready').textContent = data.stats.readyPickup;
  document.getElementById('in-production').textContent = data.stats.inProduction;
  document.getElementById('queue-length').textContent = data.stats.queueItems;
  document.getElementById('active-orders').textContent = data.stats.activeOrders;
}

// Refresh every 30 seconds
setInterval(loadStats, 30000);
```
